ARABIC: وَإِلَٰهُكُمْ إِلَٰهٌ وَٰحِدٌ لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Your God is One God. There is no god but Him, the All-Merciful, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Your God is one God; there is no god other than He, the compassionate, ever-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Your Deity is Allah alone: there is no deity save the All-Beneficent and All-Merciful Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Our Lord is the only Lord. There is no God but He, the Beneficent and Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Your God is One God; there is no God except Him – the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And your Ilah (God) is One Ilah (God ـ Allah), La ilaha illa Huwa (there is none who has the right to be worshipped but He), the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And your God is one God! there is no god but He; He is the Beneficent, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Your God is One God; there is no god but He, the All-merciful, the All-compassionate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Your Allah is One Allah; there is no Allah save Him, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Your God is one God. There is no deity save Him. He is the Compassionate, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the God of you all is one God; there is no God but he, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Your god is the One God; there is no god except Him, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And your Allah is One Allah: There is no god but He, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And your Ilah (God) is One Ilah (God - Allah), La ilaha illa Huwa (there is none who has the right to be worshipped but He), the Most Beneficent, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Your God is One God. There is no god except He. He is the Merciful, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Your God is one God. There is no god but He, the Benevolent, the Compassionate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And your god is one God. There is no deity [worthy of worship] except Him, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [2:163] When they asked him [Muhammad (s)] to describe his Lord, the following was revealed: Your God, the One deserving of your worship, is One God, without any equal in either essence or attribute; there is no god except Him, He is the Compassionate, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then declares His Oneness because the unbelievers denied this divine Oneness, saying: (Your God is one God) without son or partner; (there is no God save Him, the Beneficent) the Tender, (the Merciful) the Compassionate.
